Jack Plewa

MD-PhD Student (rotation)
Email
jbplewaobfuscate@UTMB.EDU
Workspace
5.416, Research Building 6

Jack (Plewa) Tiller is a third-year MD-PhD student (2022-) at UTMB, currently completing his second lab rotation and planning to join the Structural Biology and Biophysics track. Jack is interested in infectious diseases and aerospace medicine. In our lab, Jack is developing programming skills and applying bioinformatics methods to study the spaceflight-associated neuro-ocular syndrome (SANS). He is considering a career path at NASA or in the private space sector, potentially as a pathologist, flight surgeon, research scientist, or in space exploration.
